snippet: Top-seeded Stan Wawrinka cruised past Albert Ramos-Vinolas of Spain 6-1, 6-1 in the Geneva Open second round on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Stan Wawrinka cruised past Albert Ramos-Vinolas of Spain 6-1, 6-1 in the Geneva Open second round on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Top-Seeded Wawrinka Cruises to Win in Geneva Open 2nd Round
headline.main: Top-Seeded Wawrinka Cruises to Win in Geneva Open 2nd Round
